TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler(object sender, ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs)
public delegate void ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 、、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , or event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ， ，或事件控制項可讓您管理用來判斷所呼叫的方法參數控制項。The , , , or event of the control allows you to manipulate the parameters that are used to determine the method that is called by the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項以插入資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 一開始，顯示新`NorthwindEmployee`記錄，以及自動產生**插入** 按鈕。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 資料輸入的欄位之後控制，請按一下**插入** 按鈕，而屬性會識別哪一種方法執行動作。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button, and the property will identify which method performs the action. 在此範例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用來執行插入; 不過，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`來插入資料的參數。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 基於這個理由，集合的字串，控制項將會自動是不夠的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委派處理物件事件可讓您操作之前輸入的參數和作業會繼續進行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因為`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`物件做為參數，其中會使用字串集合來建立並加入至集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用的範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 程式碼範例是由下列兩個基本類別和其他類別所組成：The code example consists of the following two basic classes and one additional class: - `EmployeeLogic`類別，這是無狀態的類別封裝商務邏輯。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別，這是包含只需要以載入保存資料與資料層的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. - 額外`NorthwindDataException`類別，為了方便起見而提供。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class, which is provided as a convenience. 這組範例類別會搭配 Northwind Traders 資料庫，這是適用於 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 範例資料庫。This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database that is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 如需完整的工作範例，請使用這些類別，將它們放在應用程式根目錄底下的 App_Code 目錄或其編譯成為程式庫，並將產生的 DLL 放在 Bin 目錄。For a complete working example, use these classes by placing them in the App_Code directory under the application root or by compiling them into a library and placing the resulting DLL in the Bin directory. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時嘗試使用這個範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]
